title: FS/FT: 1887 Old Judge August Kloff SGC 20

posts.post_title: FS/FT: 1887 Old Judge August Kloff SGC 20
posts.post_content:
As the title says.. I have the following card available for sale/trade.
Looking for any OJ that I need (in a PSA holder, any grade) or $100.

Player - August Kloff
Team - Minneapolis
Grade - SGC 30
Pose - 264-4
Still available,  would trade for just about any OJ graded by PSA, even one in an AUTH holder without a number grade.
